Transaction ID.semantic_description: A unique identifier for each transaction made in the cafe.

Item.semantic_description: The name of the item purchased in the transaction, such as coffee, sandwich, etc.

Quantity.semantic_description: The number of units of the item purchased in the transaction.

Price Per Unit.semantic_description: The price of a single unit of the item purchased in the transaction.

Total Spent.semantic_description: The total cost of the transaction, calculated as the Quantity multiplied by the Price Per Unit.

Payment Method.semantic_description: The payment method used in the transaction, e.g., cash, credit card, etc.

Location.semantic_description: The location of the cafe where the transaction took place.

Transaction Date.semantic_description: The date when the transaction was executed.

dirty_cafe_sales.description: This table holds data about each sales transaction at the cafe, including items purchased, quantities, prices, total amount spent, and the payment method.

database_description: This database captures the sales transactions of a cafe, detailing individual purchases including item details, quantities, pricing, payment methods, and transactional information pertinent to retail operations.
